summary: This is an email chain from October 2020 regarding logistical planning for a DOJ/FBI briefing for victims in the Epstein case. It discusses agenda items such as victim packets, RSVPs, travel arrangements, and access to the Miami Field Office.

persons.name: Dr.
persons.role: Potential contributor to victim resource materials
persons.context: Mentioned as a possible person to include resource materials similar to those provided in a previous year's briefing for victims.

events.title: Miami Field Office Access
events.description: Planning for potential access needs to the FBI's Miami Field Office by ODAG personnel.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division and the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) were coordinating a victim briefing in late 2020.
Logistical details included preparing packets for victims, managing RSVPs and travel, and securing room blocks at a Marriott hotel.
There was consideration of providing victims with a virtual attendance option.
The email indicates ongoing official engagement with victims years after Epstein's arrest and death.
